correspAction.name: the Editor of the Australische Zeitung

head.supplied: Melbourne, 11 December 1895. ¶ Perhaps, honoured Sir, you still have no more accurate news about the unsuccessful German expedition that traversed New Guinea for the first time and in fact at the larg...

div.p: To the Editor of the Australische Zeitung

p.style: font-family: Geneva, ﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found. For the text given here, see Australische Zeitung, 18 December 1895, p.6 (B95.12.06). The letter was introduced as follows: ‘Eingesandte Ergänzung des in letzter Nummer gebrachten Berichts über die verunglückte deutsche Neu Guinea Expedition’. [Submitted addition to the report on the unsuccessful German New Guinea expedition published in the last number].

p.seg: Vielleicht, verehrter Herr, haben Sie noch keine genaueren Nachrichten über die verunglückte deutsche Expedition, welche zum ersten Mal Neu Guinea, und zwar in der grösseren Breite, durchschritt. So mögen Ihnen die Einzelnheiten, welche mir Mr. W. Fitzgerald, den ich als Sammler nach dem britischen Teil der grossen Insel sandte, übergab, für Ihr schönes Blatt willkommen sein.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, ﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, ﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, ﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

p.seg: Perhaps, honoured Sir, you still have no more accurate news about the unsuccessful German expedition that traversed New Guinea for the first time and in fact at the larger width. Therefore the details that Mr W. Fitzgerald, whom I sent to the British part of the large island as collector, passed over to me might be welcome to you for your fine paper.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, ﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽﷽; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: See W. Fitzgerald to M, November 1895 (in this edition as 95.11.00f), published immediately after M’s letter.
